channel.title: Jags on Laurent Smeets
channel.description: Recent content in Jags on Laurent Smeets

item.title: Bayesian Regression in Blavaan (Using Jags)
item.description: This tutorial provides the reader with a basic tutorial how to perform a Bayesian regression in Blavaanm using Jags instead of Stan as a MCMC sampler. You can find the Blavaan Jags tutorial here. We will not delve into the the differences between Stan and Jags here (a technical explanation can be found here and a more accessible blog post here). For now it suffices to say that Stan is more efficient, especially for complex models.

item.title: WAMBS Blavaan Tutorial (Using Jags)
item.description: In this tutorial you follow the steps of the When-to-Worry-and-How-to-Avoid-the-Misuse-of-Bayesian-Statistics â€“checklist (the WAMBS-checklist). You can find a version of this tutorial using Stan instead of Jags here.
